name: RAM (outstandingbit, koon)
description:
RAM is a short game about a Ram and his Herd.

A little 5 minute experience, play all the way! Has two endings. Is beatable, we promise.
Made in a cave, with a box of scraps.

How to Play:

Any Key to skip Menu + Transitions
WASD to Move
ESC to close
Kill mice, kill wolves, protect your stuff!

Made by:

Ob - Programming
Mono - Art, sad shambling bits of Code
Shauing - Chase Music
Zismomusik - Sound Assist

Attributions:

Door Squeak, Loud, A.wav by InspectorJ
sheep bleat by irsf
sheep baa by robinhood76
cow bells valley by ravelite
thunderstorm coming with birds & passing car.wav by arnaud coutancier
monster aah by matrixxx_

This game was made as a submission for LOWREZJAM 2020
